blogPost.title: Introduction to GraphQL
blogPost.body: GraphQL is a query language for APIs and a runtime for executing those queries by using a type system you define for your data.

blogPost.title: Advanced GraphQL Queries
blogPost.body: In this post, we will explore advanced GraphQL queries and how to optimize them for better performance.

blogPost.title: GraphQL vs REST
blogPost.body: This article compares GraphQL with REST and discusses the pros and cons of each approach.
